user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, supportive undergarments that would provide ease of wear throughout the day, especially under various types of clothing.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to this product primarily because of its exceptional comfort and softness, which was highlighted in the description and my own experience. The fabric's ability to wick moisture and the design features that provide support without wires were significant factors in my decision. I wanted something that would feel good against my skin and provide all-day comfort, especially under fitted clothing.

Similar to my previous purchase, I was motivated by the promise of comfort and support. The description emphasized the innovative fabric and design that molds to my shape, which appealed to my need for a bra that would not only be comfortable but also functional. The seamless construction and versatility of the convertible straps were also key features that influenced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, durability, and a good fit. I value high-quality materials that feel soft against the skin, such as cotton and synthetic blends that provide breathability and moisture-wicking properties. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be used for various occasions, whether it's casual wear or more formal settings. Additionally, I tend to favor products that have functional features, like pockets for convenience or adjustable elements for a better fit. On the other hand, I dislike items that do not maintain their quality after washing, such as those that shrink significantly or lose their shape. I also find it unappealing when products lack sufficient functionality, like not having enough pockets or being difficult to wear comfortably.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, supportive undergarments for all-day wear. within my expected price range: [12.99, 18.99]
What specific type of undergarments are you looking for, such as bras, panties, or athletic underwear?
I need ["Clothing Shoes & Jewelry", "Women", "Clothing", "Lingerie Sleep & Lounge", "Lingerie"] category products.
What materials do you prefer for your undergarments, such as cotton, lace, or spandex?
I prefer materials like cotton and synthetic blends for my undergarments.
What do you prioritize more: breathability or stretchability in your undergarments?
I prioritize breathability in my undergarments.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Signature Breathe Cotton Brief Underwear 6-Pack> / Item ID: B07PYB8F1G / Price: $10.47 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Hanes Signature Breathe Cotton Briefs deliver a no-show look under any outfit. Breathable, ring spun cotton is soft against your skin and features X-Temp cooling to help keep you feeling comfortable. The Signature Breathe Brief is nice if you desire full front, hip and seat coverage. Lay-flat waist and leg bands help minimize lines under clothes and are designed to stay in place for a no ride up fit. So grab your Signature Breathe Cotton Briefs; they're perfect for every day, all day comfort. Available in a 6-pack of assorted colors."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Eversoft Cotton Hipster Underwear, Tag Free & Breathable, Available in Plus Size> / Item ID: B0B15GQCC1 / Price: $9.29 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Start your day bright-eyed and cotton-bottomed with Fruit of the Loom®'s newly reinvented cotton hipsters. The style you love is now softer than ever and built for all day comfort. We've used a finer yarn to create a wonderfully soft feel that will have you ready to tackle the day. These hipsters come with a durable, plush-backed waistband that is guaranteed to remain ravel free wash after wash, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom® panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner for ultimate comfort. These hipsters feature a moderate rise with full seat coverage."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."]
